title: Plumbing Website
description: Developed a responsive and modern website for a plumbing company. The project involved creating an intuitive user interface, integrating online booking, and ensuring SEO optimization.

title: Full Text Search Engine
description: Implemented a full text search engine that supports fast and efficient search queries across large datasets. The project involved designing the indexing and query processing algorithms.

title: OpenPecha Contribution
description: Contributed to the OpenPecha project by developing tools for the digitization and annotation of classical texts. The project aimed to make historical documents more accessible to researchers.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: Built a scalable e-commerce platform to support various online stores. Implemented features such as shopping carts, payment integration, and product management.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. The site is responsive and includes animations and interactive elements.
